amendment.description: To set aside funds for the activities to commemorate the Louisiana Purchase at the Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve in the State of Louisiana.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1728 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1728 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S11813-11814) To set aside funds for the activities to commemorate the Louisiana Purchase at the Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve in the State of Louisiana.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1728 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1728 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Landrieu.
